name: Generate a default evaluation report for a tabular multiclass classification problem

steps.name: Given a valid, preconfigured inference unit for tabular multiclass classification
And a uuid my_unique_identifier for the inference unit evaluation
And an evaluation plan file for tabular multiclass classification with no evaluation tasks and no report spec
When we read the evaluation plan
When there is no report specification in the evaluation plan
When we run inference unit evaluation
Then the generated evaluation report contains a performance summary table section
Then the generated evaluation report contains a confusion matrix section
Then the specified dataset reference is in the report
Then the specified uuid is in the report

fullName: It must be possible to assess that a multiclass tabular classification inference unit behaves as intended: Generate a default evaluation report for a tabular multiclass classification problem

labels.name: feature
labels.value: It must be possible to assess that a multiclass tabular classification inference unit behaves as intended
